thread.title: Novelist Sara Blaedel on Paul Simon’s ‘Hurricane Eye’

author: wsjcom
title: Novelist Sara Blaedel on Paul Simon’s ‘Hurricane Eye’
text:
Sara Blaedel, 53, is a Danish crime novelist and the author of 11 books, including “The Undertaker’s Daughter” (Grand Central). She spoke with Marc Myers.
In Denmark, my dream had always been to work in television. My father was a famous print journalist, and I was a journalist as well. TV seemed more exciting, and in 2001, I got my wish... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
